Title: Famous people, famous words -- Lei Feng
Publisher: Neimenggu daxue chubanshe (内蒙古大学出版社)
Notes: "Famous people, famous words" is an educational series from 1996, presenting a number of famous persons, both Chinese and foreign, and their famous utterances. This quote from Lei Feng, one of the persistent behavioral models of the CCP, reads: "Youth is always beautiful, but true youth belongs only to those who are always striving for the top, those who always work hard, and those who are always humble!" (青春啊，永远是美好的，可是真正的青春，只属于这些永远力争上游的人，永远忘我劳动的人，永远谦虚的人！).
